title: Must Read: Meryll Rogge Wins 2025 Andam Prize, L'Oréal To Acquire Color Wow
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Tuesday. Belgian designer Meryll Rogge is the winner of the 2025 Andam Prize. Rogge took home the €300,000 Grand Prize, while Alainpaul won the €100,000 Special Prize. Burc Akyol won the Pierre Bergé Prize and Sarah Levy won the Accessories ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
